== Description ==
A class for caching responses from the eve api.

== Methods ==
|| Name || Description ||
|| Save(string filePath) || Save the response cache to this filename ||
|| Save(Stream s) || Save the response cache using an external stream ||
|| Load(string filePath) || Load the response cache from this filename ||
|| Load(Stream s) || Load the response cache from an external stream ||
|| Set(string url, ApiResponse response) || Cache a response with plain text url ||
|| Get(string url) || Get ApiResponse from cache using plain text url ||
